Reviews.Title: Very Good product
Reviews.Author: Tomas
Reviews.Content: I been using this camera for about 15 days and the image is very clear day and nightis FTP capable, SMTP capableSofware is easy to configure and use, PTZ is fast and responds very goodWIFI connection is stable has not been a need to re'set camera or change to cable connection as it is very fast

Reviews.Title: Nice picture and features but they only work a few hrs before breaking
Reviews.Author: Blackstone Asphalt
Reviews.Content: Bought three of these, easy to set up very nice picture, BUT 1 died within 4 hrs, another died within 2 days.... Sent all 3 back for a refund. Seller was great to deal with and refunded money very quickly.

ProductInfo.Features:
RJ45 10/100MB self-adaptable Ethernet slot
Day/night auto switch provide secure in darkness
Use free app, scan QR code and get live feed on your phone right now
Only allow authorized users access, keeps your recordings secure
Motion Detection 24 hour secure
ProductInfo.Name: EasyN H3-V10R 1MP HD Megapixel 720P Outdoor Waterproof IP Camera Plug and Play
